metadata.name: The Beacon Chain Ethereum 2.0
metadata.description:
How would Ethereum 2.0 look like if it was physical? The Merge is coming soon and let´s hope to see a full functional upgrade to Ethereum 2.0 soon. My tribute to the brilliant Vitalik Buterin and other creators of the best world computer. 

Image file: 4000x6472 pixels in Φ aspect ratio – 1:1.618

Created in Newtek Lightwave 3D. Compositing and postproduction in Adobe After Effects.
